title: Elise in TFT
body: Can we please make the spider from her ult not do extra damage to her opponents when she wins? This adds up to a massive amount of free dmg if she ults right at the end of a match and honestly it makes no sense that her spiderlings do that.

replies.body: Actually her spiders trigger the demon buff too when they attack, so that alone makes her strong. I just really don't think they should add to character dmg taken being a summoned unit, the same can go for the golem too.
If only they applied item effects...

elise herself is pretty weak, but she's a monster with hextec gunblade and some real attack speed, maybe with some armor too, she becomes immortal, the spiderlings are fine, elise takes a long time to get them, and has no mana or ability afterwards.
They have to give her some upside of putting her on the board because she is pretty useless.
They are units. Elise isn't very good other then demon filling or meat shield. It's just one of the bonuses of taking her.
